title: Huffman Coding
algorithmDescription: Build optimal Huffman tree for data compression using greedy algorithm
detailedDescription: Build Huffman tree for optimal prefix-free encoding. Input: Number of characters, then character-frequency pairs. Output: Total encoding cost (sum of frequency * depth for all chars). Use min heap to build tree greedily by combining lowest frequency nodes.
hints: Use min heap with character frequencies
solutionApproach: Insert all characters with frequencies to min heap. While heap size > 1: extract two min nodes, create parent with sum of frequencies, insert parent. Calculate total cost by traversing tree.
testCaseCriteria: Must build optimal Huffman tree. Total cost should be minimum possible. Should demonstrate greedy construction.
